engines.name: ChunkAnnotator
engines.description: OpenNLP Chunker provides chunks to tokens in IOB format (e.g. B-NP, I-VP)

engines.name: PosTagAnnotator
engines.description: OpenNLP Part Of Speech Tagger. This annotator assumes that sentences and tokens have been annotated first.

engines.name: SentenceAnnotator
engines.description: Sentence splitter, based on OpenNLP's MaxEnt SentenceDetector, and trained on biomedical corpora (PennBio or Genia corpora).

engines.name: TokenAnnotator
engines.description: OpenNLP Tokenizer. This engine assumes that sentences have been annotated first.
